title: Russian Forces Push Toward Ukraine’s Capital, Bombing Intensifies
sub_head: Airstrikes hit cities, tanks roll in and casualties mount, as West pledges further action against Moscow
body:
Russian forces closed in on the Ukrainian capital of Kyiv and the city came under renewed bombing in the early hours of Friday, as President Volodymyr Zelensky vowed not to surrender and the capital’s defenders geared up for urban combat.
Gunfire erupted in several neighborhoods of northern Kyiv on Friday afternoon, in what Ukrainian officials said were clashes with Russian infiltrators. Ukrainian artillery and tanks were moving through the city.
